# import/no-default-export <Badge type="info" text="Restriction" />

<div class="rule-meta">
</div>

### What it does

Forbid a module to have a default exports. This help your editor to provide better auto imports.

### Examples

```javascript
// bad1.js

// There is a default export.
export const foo = "foo";
const bar = "bar";
export default "bar";
```

```javascript
// bad2.js

// There is a default export.
const foo = "foo";
export { foo as default };
```

## References

- [Rule Source](https://github.com/oxc-project/oxc/blob/main/crates/oxc_linter/src/rules/import/no_default_export.rs)
